import { Post } from '@/features/post/types';

const PostsPage = () => {
    const posts:Post[] = [];
    // TODO: API;
    return (
        <div>
            <h1>Posts</h1>

            <ul>
                {posts.map((post) => (
                <li key={post.id}>{post.title}</li>
                ))}
            </ul>
        </div>
    );
}
export default PostsPage;

React Query

,RSC,,React Query.,hooks,,.

js
"use client"
import { getPosts } from "@/features/post/queries/get-posts";
import { useQuery } from "@tanstack/react-query";

const PostsPage = () => {
    const { data:posts } = useQuery({
        queryKey:['posts'],
        queryFn: getPosts,
    });
    // ...
}

React Query

RSC,React Query.,,?
RSC,(),,React Query().
"",,props;React Query.

js
import { getPosts } from "@/features/post/queries/get-posts";
import { PostList } from "./_components/post-list";

const PostsPage = async () => {
    const posts = await getPosts();
    return (
        <div>
            <h1>RSC + React Query</h1>
            <PostList initalPosts={posts} />
        </div>
    )
}
export default PostsPage;

.,,.,posts,.

js
'use client';
import { getPosts } from "@/features/post/queries/get-posts";
import { Post } from "@/features/post/types";
import { useQuery } from "@tanstack/react-query";

type PostListProp = {
    initalState:Post[];
};

const PostList  = ({initalPosts} : PostListProp}) =>{
    const { data: posts } = useQuery({  // inifite scrolling
        queryKey:['posts'],
        queryFn:getPosts,
        initalState:initalPosts,
    });
    return (
        <ul>
        {posts?.map((post) => (         // render logics
            <li key={post.id}>{post.title}</li>
        ))}
        </ul>
    )
};
export default PostList;

initialPosts,useQueryinitialState..
,,React Query.
:RSC,React Query.

getPosts:RSC(RSC),API,(RQ).

,getPosts.,Server Action,getPosts,.

React use() API

Reactuse() API.Promise,resolve.await. (?)

js
import { Suspense } from "react";
import { getPosts } from "@/features/post/queries/get-posts";
import { PostList } from "./_components/post-list";

const PostsPage = async () => {
    const postsPromise = getPosts();
    return (
        <div>
            <h1>use(Promise)</h1>
            <Suspense>
                <PostList promisedPosts={postPromise}/>
            </Suspense>
        </div>
    )
}
export default PostsPage;

.async/awaitPromise resolve,Promise,use()APIPromise.

js
"use client"
import { use } from 'react';
import { Post } from '@/features/post/types';

type PostListProp = {
    promisedPosts:Promise<Post[]>;
}

const PostList = ({promisedPosts}:PostListProp) => {
    const posts = use(promisedPosts);
    return (
        <ul>
        {posts?.map((post) => (
            <li key={post.id}>{post.title}</li>
        ))}
        </ul>
    );
}

(*),.,async.
,use() API,async/await,,.

Hooks

,hooks,.,React.

js
"use client";
import { getPosts } from "@/features/post/queries/get-posts";
import { Post } from "@/features/post/types";
import { useEffect, useState } from "react";

const PostPage = () => {
    const [posts, setPosts] = useState<Post[]>([]);
    useEffect(() => {
        const fetchPosts = async () =>{
            const posts = await getPosts();
            setPosts(posts);
        };
        fetchPosts();
    }, []);
    // return ... 
}

React Query,useEffect()useState().,,,,.

TRPC For Typed Data Fetching

,-,REST.,React Query.
:.().,OpenAPItyped schema.
schemaRPC(Remote Procedure Calls),tRPC.API.tRPC:

js
"use client";
import {trpc} from '~/trp/client';
const PostPage = () => {
    const posts = trpc.posts.getPosts.useQuery();
    // ...
}

tRPC,,,(,).
,.,tRPC,Node.jsTypescript.
